snippet.title: [Visual Novel Trailer] Three Lilies and Their Ghost Stories
snippet.description:
milk+ visual's latest title, Three Lilies and Their Ghost stories, is releasing January 22nd, 2023 for PC and Android!

A free kinetic (choiceless) yuri visual novel by milk+ visual, developer of soundless - A MODERN SALEM IN REMOTE AREA -, Three Lilies and Their Ghost Stories features three distinct stories surrounding ghosts and lesbian relationships. A romance set in 90s rural China; a horror set in 2010s suburban America; a sci-fi thriller set on a fictional 2030s floating island—one after another, witness three stories and see how thin the line separating us from the afterlife truly is.

Check it out on Itch.io: https://milkplus.itch.io/three-lilies

BGM: 予兆 by MusMus https://musmus.main.jp/

+ About +
This is the official channel for milk+ visual, a doujin yuri visual novel studio!
Here we upload trailers and other press materials, as well as occasionally stream development progress.
If you would like to keep up with us, please subscribe and check out our other social medias!

+ External Links +
Website: https://milkplus.moe/
Itchio: https://milkplus.itch.io/
Blog: https://dev.milkplus.moe
Newsletter: https://milkplus.substack.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/vDcERUW
Twitter: https://twitter.com/milkplusvn
Tumblr: https://milkplusvn.tumblr.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/milkplusvn/
Cohost: https://cohost.org/milkplus

#MilkPlusVisual #VisualNovel #ThreeLilies
